name: The Wizard Ran R
description:
• Next chapter: TBA
  • Previous chapter
  • First chapter

The return of the wizard! This is the 80th game in the series, and it is time to rock and roll and defeat the adversary. Familiar faces that everyone know of will come to your rescue. The wizard will never give up, and I can guarantee that this chapter will not let you down.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move?
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact?
  • R: Reach the ending
  • Enter: go to next screen
  • B: blocked by RCA PWL or whatever
